reviews.text: People was telling me they have best shakahushka.. first of all I waited 40 min for order.. and shakshushka made of tomato paste instead or real tomatoes.. definitely not eating that again

Tete-a-tete is my favorite place! I go there quite often, and I honestly love everything about it ‚Äî from the amazing coffee to the excellent service provided by the staff. On weekends, it‚Äôs the only spot I choose to go clubbing. Thank you for such a high level of service and care for your guests! üí´‚ù§Ô∏è

This cozy caf√©, managed by Konstantin, offers a warm, inviting atmosphere with a great variety of food and drinks. The menu includes hearty entr√©es, fresh salads, sandwiches, pizzas, and indulgent desserts beautifully displayed in the glass case. Their drink selection is extensive, from classic coffees to iced lattes and fresh juices. Seating is limited but intimate, making it a nice spot to relax. Overall, it‚Äôs a charming place with tasty offerings and friendly vibes.
Myy favorite hookah spot

Victor was an awesome server. I would recommend this place as a no#1 place to go to the atmosphere whith jazz playing  was outstanding!!!
We shall return again thank you Victor!!
Very rude security
Great WiFi. One of the ladies was missing an eye so I took the star off. Coffee is questionable -- i didn't die.

Classic Brooklyn cafe brunch and lunch spot which I cannot recommend enough

The food and ambiance were really good. But the service was completely terrible. Every time I came, the waiters were really rude. Everything was great except the service.

As a cafe, Tete-a-Tete should be known as a classic in Sheepshead Bay by now!

Whether you're on the go, relaxing, or you got a big exam coming up? This place is there for you.
It's been my go-to work/study place for a couple phases of my life.
The staff and people are always friendly and remember your face. Don't forget to tip your barista, because you'll always come back :)
Nice place, very great food üç≤

"Tete-a-tete" is a place where time slows down. Here you can enjoy not only great coffee but also a warm and cozy atmosphere.
Rating: 5 out of 5
A special thank you to the barista Vasily for his professionalism and friendliness. He always greets customers with a smile and makes the perfect coffee that brightens the mood for the whole day. Vasily, your work is a true art!
I always buy some coffee before the work, and I can say truly, the best day starts with coffee.

Came for a drink, stayed for the food, the beats, and the boys.
DJ Misha kills it every time, and Kostya, Andrey & Vova make you feel like royalty (with shots).
Best vibe in town ‚Äî don‚Äôt tell too many people üç∏üé∂
Vasyl was very helpful and made sure our order came quick and correct. Great steak sandwich and amazing cold iced teas to beat the heat.

Tete-a-Tete is my go-to coffee spot in Brooklyn! The owner has created a wonderful place with amazing coffee and fresh pastries. But what truly makes this caf√© stand out are Katya and Vasya ‚Äì they are not only talented baristas but also incredibly kind and welcoming people. Their coffee is made with care, and every visit feels like a little treat. Highly recommend this place to anyone!
Chicken was a bit undercooked.

Many thanks to Vasiliy and Katerina for always making great coffee and creating such a welcoming atmosphere.
The coffee is really good, so I keep coming back every time!

Absolutely amazing experience at Tet-a-Tet Caf√©!
The food is delicious, the atmosphere is cozy, and the service is top-notch. But what really made our visit unforgettable were the incredible baristas ‚Äî Vasiliy and Katerina. They are not only professional and attentive, but also full of charm and great energy.

Atmosphere in any food place depend on service and prople who serve you, absolutely smazing service by Vasiliy and Katya, polite, caring, warm, I felt there like home only because of the service they provided, thank you so much, great experience!!!!!!!

I absolutely love Tete-A-Tete! The coffee is always on point, and the desserts are dangerously good. What really makes this place special is the amazing service ‚Äî Katya and Vasta  always greet you with a smile and make your day a little better. Highly recommend!

Tete-A-Tete is a cozy and welcoming Cafe with a great atmosphere. The staff are truly amazing ‚Äì Vasya and Katya always go above and beyond to make every visit special. Their professionalism and warm attitude make you feel right at home. Highly recommend!

I stop by this place often, and the coffee is always amazing! Huge thanks to Vasya and Katya ‚Äî they make it so delicious every time. Super friendly and kind people, it‚Äôs always a pleasure to see them. Highly recommend!
Excellent service by Vasy I Katy they making best macchiato and cappuccino  in neighborhood  they are very friendly and kindly . Highly recommended love to come every day !
Great coffee and food . Amazing staff Katya and Vasyl are always full of energy very helpful . Always with a smile on
One of the favorite coffee shops in Brooklyn !! Vasiliy and Katerina always make the best coffee :)

Vasily is an exceptional barista! He‚Äôs incredibly attentive and always remembers the drinks his customers like ‚Äî I never have to repeat my order. He immediately starts preparing the most delicious coffee as soon as I walk in. On top of‚Ä¶

I absolutely loved my visit to this caf√©! The atmosphere is so warm and welcoming, and the coffee was just perfect ‚Äì rich, smooth, and full of flavor. Vasily, the barista, was incredibly friendly and attentive. He prepared my coffee with great care and skill, and it was clear he knows his craft. It‚Äôs rare to meet someone who is both passionate and professional about what they do. I‚Äôll definitely come back here again and recommend this caf√© to anyone looking for a great coffee experience

If there‚Äôs any magic in this city, it‚Äôs in a cup of coffee made by Vasily at T√™te-√†-T√™te! This barista with straight hair works wonders ‚Äî every morning he saves me from sleepiness and a bad mood. The coffee is divine, and the atmosphere feels just like home. Thank you, Vasily!
Lovely ambience
I love the coffee here, been costumer to Tete for more then a year and they never disappoint, service is on point all the time, go for an iced latte with a caramel shot. You‚Äôll love it!!!

I have been there like 3 times already and every time I come there is a Slavic guy  cashier. He is always rude and impolite with customers. If he hates his job and people he serves, why still he works there??? Just release him please!! Let him go for good. The only thing I don't like in this place. Honestly. I'm business co owner myself and I check in and check out clients. No matter what, bad mood, head ache, high blood pressure etc. I always treat  every  single our client with respect and smile. Because this is a minimum if you work in services!

My girlfriend and I had the most delightful breakfast this morning at T√™te-√†-T√™te, and it exceeded all expectations in every way. We ordered the Shakshuka and Syrniki, and let me tell you, each dish could easily grace the table of a Michelin-starred restaurant. The attention to detail, from plating to service was impeccable. The ambiance was charming and tastefully eclectic, vintage elegance with a modern artistic twist. Plush velvet chairs, quirky portraits made it feel both cozy and elevated. T√™te-√†-T√™te isn‚Äôt just a breakfast spot, it‚Äôs a destination. Whether you‚Äôre local or just visiting Brooklyn, this is a must-try culinary experience.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüî•üî•üî•

The best place in brooklyn. Tete a tete cafe is my favorite cafe for coffee and sweets. They have very big menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. They have launch on the second floor, hookah and bar. The staff is the best staff I have ever seen, they are always smiling, so friendly and always positive. Love this place it is my go to place, the only place I shop for coffee.

The second floor is the place I spent most of my time with my husband
Has been my go to place since 2014

Best hookah in town. Good food and great service.
The best RAF coffe in Brooklyn ü•∞üôè

Excellent place to enjoy very taste coffee and amazing sweets
Very nice team always ready to suggest something new and just have some nice talkings‚Ä¶

Amazing  place with a Russian  twist. The food was amazingly delicious and  fresh.  I came specifically from  Staten Island to  this place.  DJ Daniel  is  awesome. The Borsch and Pelmeni  were out of this world fresh  and  delicious.

The drinks  were made to perfection. Bartender  Andrey  is amazing.  The lychee martini  is awesome. Moscow  mule is a classic.  Bloody Russian  Andrey  made is rocking.  Kalinka Malinka  drink  is amazing.

Loved every minute in this place.
Also the Hookah  with mint is awesome.  This place is great.

Absolutely love this caf√©! The food is always fresh and delicious, the staff are friendly and attentive, and the caf√© club perks are awesome. The DJ at night is stunning and plays the best sets-great music, great vibes, every time.

A good place to relax, eat and enjoy the atmosphere and pleasant service...
I recommend!üëå

Wow, my exhibition has come to an end. And I want to separately thank everyone who supported me, inspired me, performed. In this post, I want to once again thank to Oleg Novikov and his team, headed by the Chef Maxim Tvorogov! This is the best catering in New York. When I opened the tray and each small dish was decorated with such love and flowers (even echoed my works) I was very touched and pleasantly surprised! The team of chefs worked all night to create the atmosphere and mood for the guests of the art space Brooklyn Art Cave. It worked out more than a hundred percent! I am infinitely grateful to you. Come back with a return visit and  my best recommendations for Cafe/Lounge Tete-A-Tete

I enjoyed cozy atmosphere, good service and great food presentation. Definitely cool vibes! Their drinks and coffees are amazing, and food is good but not great for me personally. My smoked salmon omelet was on the dry side, and the salad that it was served with didn‚Äôt have any dressing on it.

Absolutely loved this cafe! The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming‚Äîperfect for catching up with friends or just unwinding with a good book. The staff are warm and attentive, making the whole experience even better. Special shout-out to Vasil for crafting the drinks to absolute perfection‚Äîseriously some of the best I've had. Highly recommend!

This is the only store where I visited twice prior to posting a review because I wanted to provide close to a full picture of this hidden gem.

Visit 1: 10AM Saturday Brunch
We did not have a reservation but were able to get a seat pretty quickly. Store is two levels, first floor is a take out cafe with desserts, second floor is the restaurant with a bar. As you can see from the pictures, dining area is beautifully set up and the environment is just lovely for brunch.

I ordered an Americano and my friend ordered a ‚Äúfreshly squeezed green apple juice‚Äù. It‚Äôs in quotes because I made fun of her for ordering it. But it turned out to be so pretty in this emerald color. The table next to us asked what we ordered and ended up getting one as well.

I really recommend the chicken fingers, it‚Äôs not the school lunch kind of chicken fingers you imagine when you think of this dish. It was crispy and delightful, served with a sauce that tasted like honey mustard.

My friend ordered an omelette and I ordered the French toast with berries. Both turned out amazing. The potatoes that came with the omelette were was perfectly flavored and crispy.

Visit 2: Friday night dinner around 5PM
Walked in again without a reservation, was seated quickly and told that we only have the table for 2 hours which was enough for us. Different from brunch, at night the place turns into a hookah lounge w. dinner service. If you do not like the smell of smoke or hookah, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend going at night. If you don‚Äôt mind it, this might just be your next favorite go to spot!

We ordered two drinks, a Russian Viagra and a Passion Fruit Martini. When the bar tender brought the drinks to us it was filled all the way to the rims and she said ‚ÄúI was being too generous‚Äù. We both thought she meant the amount but after we took a sip we understood she meant the amount of alcohol lol. Simply delicious.

We got a beef tartar appetizer and it‚Äôs very different than your average beef tartar where the meat is raw and bright red. Here, they seasoned the raw meat before hand in a sweet marinade and added finely chopped onions into the tartar. Dish is served with toasts (wasn‚Äôt enough and we had to ask for more which the waiter gave for no problem). For us it tasted much better than the generic beef tartar, definitely would order again.

Lastly, we ordered a brisket with mashed potatoes. It wasn‚Äôt very good and tasted like frozen diner food. Would not recommend.

Give it a try the next time you are itching brunch or just some chill time with hookah and friends!

Really like this place, has a lounge, bakery, restaurant and bar vibe all at the same time. The food is of top quality, hookah is smooth, good choice of coffee and since I dont have alcohol the bartender made non-alcoholic mocktails.
Tip: Better to have reservation in the weekends

I was in the area on a Saturday morning and decided to get coffee and a quick breakfast here.  There was only one person ahead of me when I arrived.  I ordered an omlette and it somehow took over 40 minutes to make for something I could've made better at home.  Did they have to get the chickens to lay their eggs or something?  My caramel latte had so much syrup in it that I couldn't taste any coffee.  Extremely disappointed.
I come here quite often and the staff is always friendly and smiling. The food is good, the deserts are great and they got a large variety of good teas. Would definitely recommend it to a friend!

Decided to visit this nice cafe. The seafood crepe I ordered was very delicious and filling, the caramel latte was awesome as well. There‚Äôs also some good music. Recommend this spot for anyone looking for a good place for lunch!

Very cozy local cafe with great food and service, even dance music in PM time some weekends.

One huge minus: the smoke from hookahs in the dining area will give you headache if you are not into this. I would leave the hookahs for downstairs only to have access to fresh air faster and have a ventilation needed. Upstairs it seems to be stuck with you even though the smoke area is divided. It's a huge turn off for many as I have heard.

Otherwise -One of my favorite places in the area!

A gem in Brooklyn!! Hookah lounge, restaurant, and bar on the top floor. Cafe/bakery on the bottom floor. Went on a Thursday night for dinner and everything we got was amazingly delicious. And because it was Thursday night it wasn‚Äôt too busy and everything came out at a very reasonable speed as well!! Definitely need to come back, and would definitely recommend!

I just visited tet a tet and after leaving I immediately wanted to write a review for such a wonderful service, very kind and responsive guys work. The coffee is amazing and the desserts are delicious. I recommend visiting and I will definitely come back more than once)

We went for my dogs birthday! It was so nice!!! The food was great! They let us sit with my dog outside, and they had like a tent place outside I think they put it up for the summer it was so nice! And vibes

I‚Äôve been going here for many years now, this is by far the best hooka, food and atmosphere that you will ever experience. Even when coming for brunch with family, this place is amazing. Highly recommend and I don‚Äôt usually write reviews.

The staff were friendly, but it was a bit chilly at the tables in the back part of the cafe. There‚Äôs more space to sit there, but the wind came through from the rooftop, and the curtain fell down twice but it was manageable. The food was tasty, we had the salmon salad, pasta, and an Oreo cheesecake for dessert. Overall, I‚Äôd give it a 4 out of 5. I liked it, but with few downsides
nice place to go with friends  and they have the best syrniki in the town
I ordered DELICIOUS bbq braised beef short ribs with BEST MASHED POTATO. Thank you for your service. I haven‚Äôt tried syrniki yet, but I believe they are awesome also.
